data.markdown:
## Description

The image is a logo for the brand "Kärcher." The logo features the brand name "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast colors to ensure visibility and brand recognition. <!-- figure, from page 0 (l=0.385,t=0.042,r=0.614,b=0.086), with ID 636830d1-d2d5-472f-83dc-e7e41acf2e65 -->

## K 3 HORIZONTAL PLUS

Auf den Hochdruckreiniger K 3 Horizontal können Sie zählen: Der kleine und platzsparende Helfer ist ideal geeignet bei Verschmutzungen auf Gartenflächen, Terrassen, Gartenmöbeln und Autos. <!-- text, from page 0 (l=0.070,t=0.155,r=0.859,b=0.225), with ID 266dde9a-6547-4eba-9395-0ef7d0c721b3 -->

## Description

The image displays a pressure washer set, which includes several components:

1. **Main Unit**: 
   - The main body of the pressure washer is predominantly yellow with black accents.
   - It features a handle on top for portability.
   - The front has a vented design, likely for cooling purposes.
   - A logo is visible on the front, indicating the brand.

2. **Accessories**:
   - **Hose**: A coiled black hose is included, which connects the main unit to the spray gun.
   - **Spray Gun**: A black and yellow spray gun is part of the set, designed for easy handling.
   - **Lances**: Two different lances are provided, each with distinct nozzles for varied spray patterns.

This set is designed for cleaning tasks, utilizing high-pressure water jets to remove dirt and grime from surfaces. The color scheme and design suggest a focus on durability and user-friendliness. <!-- figure, from page 0 (l=0.311,t=0.282,r=0.703,b=0.590), with ID 66d55b7b-b5d9-485f-90f3-bbeb0cb146b7 -->

## Description of the Image

The image is a badge or emblem representing a "Guinness World Records" achievement. It features a circular design with the following elements:

- **Top Section**: The words "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" are prominently displayed in white uppercase letters on a dark blue background, forming the outer ring of the circle.
- **Center Section**: Inside the circle, there is a stylized trophy or cup icon, which is a common symbol for achievement and records.
- **Bottom Section**: Below the circular emblem, there is a rectangular section with the words "RECORD HOLDER" in bold uppercase letters. This text is in white against a gold background, emphasizing the status of holding a world record.

The overall design conveys prestige and recognition associated with holding a Guinness World Record. <!-- figure, from page 0 (l=0.871,t=0.317,r=0.916,b=0.366), with ID c8a0ad03-bc4e-4c1f-88fc-41ab3b63e110 -->

## Figure Description

The image is a graphic representation with a bold, stylized number "1" on the left side. The number is partially obscured by a bright yellow arrow shape pointing to the right. Inside the yellow arrow, there is black text that reads:

- "WORLD'S NO. 1"
- "PRE-SLICE SANDWICH BRAND"

The text is centered within the arrow, and the overall design suggests a promotional or advertising message emphasizing the brand's leading position in the market. The use of bold colors and large fonts is likely intended to capture attention and convey a sense of authority and trust. <!-- figure, from page 0 (l=0.860,t=0.384,r=0.929,b=0.414), with ID 9b84c430-5ef1-491a-84ba-7986b5353b31 -->

## Figure Description

The image is a logo or symbol with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized design that resembles a candle with a flame at the top, encircled by barbed wire. This is a well-known symbol often associated with human rights advocacy. Below the symbol, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in white. The overall design is simple yet impactful, using high contrast colors to draw attention. <!-- figure, from page 0 (l=0.860,t=0.432,r=0.927,b=0.481), with ID 4342dcfe-d236-426f-871d-d0b14198567c -->

## Figure Description

The image is a symbol representing "VARIO POWER." It features a stylized depiction of a pressure washer nozzle. The nozzle is angled downward, with a plus and minus sign above it, indicating adjustable power settings. The background is yellow, and the text "VARIO POWER" is written below the image in bold black letters. This symbol likely indicates a feature of a pressure washer that allows the user to vary the power output. <!-- figure, from page 0 (l=0.860,t=0.490,r=0.927,b=0.537), with ID ab50abca-2ce8-4fe5-a3ed-b81f179c1543 -->

## Bestell Nr.

1.602-823.0

- Praktische Zubehöraufbewahrung.
- Integrierter Ansaugmechanismus für Reinigungsmittel. <!-- text, from page 0 (l=0.076,t=0.606,r=0.383,b=0.646), with ID 5428212f-9aa6-45ed-8fbb-8d6121b30ee4 -->

## Technische Daten

| Parameter                  | Wert                  |
|----------------------------|-----------------------|
| EAN-Code                   | 4066529078162         |
| Stromart                   | Ph / V / Hz           |
|                            | 1 / 220 - 240 / 50 - 60 |
| Druck                      | bar                   |
|                            | 20 - max. 120         |
| Fördermenge                | l/h                   |
|                            | max. 380              |
| Flächenleistung            | m²/h                  |
|                            | 25                    |
| Zulauftemperatur           | °C                    |
|                            | max. 40               |
| Anschlussleistung          | W                     |
|                            | 1600                  |
| Anschlusskabel             | m                     |
|                            | 5                     |
| Farbe                      | gelb                  |
| Gewicht ohne Zubehör       | kg                    |
|                            | 3.6                   |
| Gewicht inkl. Verpackung   | kg                    |
|                            | 5.5                   |
| Abmessungen (L × B × H)    | mm                    |
|                            | 380 × 197 × 264       |

## Ausstattung

| Ausstattungselement                  | Vorhanden |
|--------------------------------------|-----------|
| Hochdruckpistole                     | G 120 Q   |
| Vario Power Jet                      | [x]       |
| Dreckfräser                          | [x]       |
| HD-Schlauch                          | m         |
|                                      | 5         |
| Geräteseitiges Quick Connect         | [x]       |
| Reinigungsmittelansatz über          | Ansaugschlauch |
| Integrierter Wasserfilter            | [x]       |
| Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4"| [x]       |
| Kabelaufwicklung                     | [x]       | <!-- table, from page 0 (l=0.068,t=0.658,r=0.487,b=0.818); page 0 (l=0.506,t=0.656,r=0.934,b=0.797), with ID 69c03abc-5c58-4289-9f8d-44ec2847e2cb -->
